name: Pew Pew (Snazy Snake Studios)
description:
Pew Pew is an artillery style, turn based game where two players face off against each other to destroy their opponents tank first.

Aim with the mouse and hold down the left mouse button to build your power. Release the mouse to fire.

Game by: Snazy Snake Studios

Members: Nathan Zaloum, Wirasatya Adhikara, Tana Jansanit
